subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: ANN ARBOR, Mich., March 17 (AP) — Tommy Amaker had maintained it was fair to expect Michigan to reach the N.C.A.A. tournament in his sixth season as the men’s basketball coach. When the Wolverines fell short of that goal, Athletic Director Bill Martin decided it was time for a change. He fired Amaker on Saturday.
